value.title: Two Young Roommates Are Building An Artificial Intelligence Real Estate Empire
value.excerpt: It's amazing to see that the pandemic has created a boom in entrepreneurialism and shown how AI and tech, along with the human touch, can both improve the lives of people and build new innovative businesses.

value.title: SenseTime gets green light from Hong Kong exchange to proceed with US$2 billion IPO, sources say
value.excerpt: SenseTime has got the green light from the Hong Kong stock exchange to proceed with its flotation, according to people familiar with the transaction, taking the largest artificial intelligence (AI) company in China a step closer to its US$2 billion initial public offering.

value.title: Advancing AI With Data And Machine Learning: What Else Is Needed?
value.excerpt: The U.S. and almost all countries today identify AI as a critical strategic area in the future of computing. Companies are more invested than ever in discovering how AI can provide advantages in their competitive markets.

value.title: Self-driving robots key to future of food
value.excerpt: The acquisition is a sign of rapid maturation in smart farming, which uses IoT sensors and AI to manage farm operations with unprecedented precision and is helping reshape food manufacturing in wealthy markets.

value.title: Jensen Huang gets chip industry’s highest honor 28 years after founding Nvidia
value.excerpt: About 38 years after he started Nvidia, CEO Jensen Huang received the chip industry's highest honor, the Robert N. Noyce Award.

value.title: Overcoming The Technological Speed Bumps On The Road To Autonomous Driving
value.excerpt: Three years ago, fully autonomous vehicles (AVs) that could take passengers 'anywhere' were supposed to have arrived on the market — at least according (paywall) to a 2015 prediction from Elon Musk. Musk was hardly alone.

value.title: Baidu, Swiss Re ink partnership to explore insurance for autonomous vehicles
value.excerpt: Swiss reinsurance company teams up with Chinese tech giant Baidu to develop insurance services that cover the entire value chain of autonomous driving, spanning producing pricing, claims, and underwriting data standards.

value.title: Automation, AI key to optimising application performance

value.title: MediaTek leaps into flagship phones with cutting-edge 4nm Dimensity 9000 chip
value.excerpt: The Dimensity 9000 is MediaTek's first true flagship phone processor, and the world's first built using a 4nm process. The company talked to us about it.

value.title: Commerce.AI Launches In AWS Marketplace
value.excerpt: Commerce.AI, a leading CX AI platform, announced today that it is available in AWS Marketplace, a digital catalog with listings from independent software vendors that make it easy to find, test, buy and deploy software.

value.title: AI-powered marketing copy generator Anyword secures $21M
value.excerpt: Anyword, a company developing an AI-powered platform that generates marketing copy, has raised $21 million in venture capital.

value.title: Radical Transparency: What Healthcare Can Learn From Fintech
value.excerpt: With the line between healthtech and fintech increasingly blurring, it’s high time for the healthcare industry to find ways to deliver a better consumer experience.

value.excerpt: Swish, a startup developing a platform to automate IT service tasks using AI, has raised $13 million in funding.

value.title: Do AI-powered lending algorithms silently discriminate? This initiative aims to find out
value.excerpt: The first is that leaving a lending decision to an algorithm mitigates the bias that can come with human judgement.
